duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in dermatological procedures and patient care.
Provide support to dermatologists in various clinical and administrative tasks.
Perform medical assisting duties such as taking patient vitals, preparing treatment rooms, and documenting patient information.
Participate in training and certification programs for dermatological technician.
Maintain a high energy level and enthusiasm for dermatological care.

education_certification.credential: High School Graduation required, College Degree preferred
